entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:33 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 5:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 43 %
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: E 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
